Khulo is a cozy and small city in the mountains of Ajara.
Daily mini bus from the main bus station in
, 2-3 hours, 6-8 Lari. Infrequent bus service to
through the Goderzi pass. Hitch hiking is easy if you know a few phrases in Georgian or Russian.
Take the cable car across the valley. The cable car stretches 1700 meter across and a ride takes 10 minutes. The cable car is used for daily means of transportation by the locals.
A number of shops and restaurants are located around the bus stop and in the upper part of the city.
There is a minor hotel right next to the bus stop. 15 Lari for a clean room with toilet and shower. Other option may include home stays. The tourist informations office can assist you.
